question: 用括号（）中所给单词的正确形式填空，答案用空格分隔：
There (be) some restaurants and a post office around my home.
Touch the (sweater)  ---Oh, they‘re soft and warm.

Can Mary (watch) TV every evening? No, she can't.
介词填空，答案用空格分隔：
() Christmas, I get many presents () my parents.

首字母填空, 判断正误，答案用空格分隔：
Hello, everyone! I l() on Green Street. It is not busy. There is a school on it.
It's not far a() from my home. So I walk to school w() my classmates every day.

There is a small park near the school. I can see many trees and flowers there. People can walk, dance and fly a kite in it.
There is a() a mountain in the park. People like climbing the mountain in the morning. How happy they are!
I go to school by bus. 判断正误(T/F)
